ComicInfo.Summary: It's a new American Mythology holiday tradition! You're not going to find any sugarplums or singing snowmen in these pages! Join us for another twisted tinsel terror-fest just in time for the horrordays! Have a fright before Christmas with three tales of holiday madness that'll make even your Aunt Edna's fruitcake seem safe! Get your stocking stuffed with demons, and dark lore, and the real secret about how a fat man in a red suit laid claim to your favorite holiday! You may not want to stay up late for these stories - then again, you may not have a choice! Ho-Ho-Horror at its bloody best!
ComicInfo.Notes: Info from indicia and publisher's site.
ComicInfo.Writer: G. O. Parsons,S. A. Check,Konstantine Paradias
